name: Fire Goblin
resistance: lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Flaming Arrows
traits.desc: Fire goblins are adept at manufacturing flaming arrows, and coupled with their produce flame cantrip, a fire goblin with prepared arrows (wrapped and treated to be easily flammable) may set up to 2 arrows on fire as a seamless part of each turn’s attack, without requiring a separate action. Preparing an arrow for such a use still takes the normal amount of time but can be done in advance and saved for a later battle.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The fire goblin’s spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The fire goblin can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: fire bolt, produce flame * 3/day each: burning hands, flame blade, flaming sphere, heat metal * 1/day: fireball, wall of fire

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fire goblin can make two attacks with its flaming arrows using its shortbow.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The goblin exhales fire in a 20-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
